text:
@billshortenmp Its hard to believe the govt when they say things like - that regardless of the COVID-19 pandemic the govt was still working towards a response, & then @GregHuntMP saying justice 4 thalidomide victims was a "personal passion" 4him & a priority 4the govt
https://t.co/3J80yUo81K
